name: prudish
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
easily shocked by rude things, especially anything relating to sex: I don't consider myself prudish but I do think the sex scenes in the film were a bit excessive. See
prude
More examplesFewer examplesAmerican collectors didn't buy nudes, Hall says. They were too prudish for that.She is inclined to be reserved and slightly prudish.The 1930s' Hollywood censors' ban on showing even a married couple in the same bed seems ludicrously prudish to us today. Let us turn to the content, at which point prudish readers might wish to turn to another page.Being a prudish kinda guy, I'm far too embarrassed to wander round a busy sauna in a tiny towel.
